data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wei, Jiu-Feng, Feng, Ji-Nian (2012): Two new species of Megacanthaspis Takagi (Hemiptera, Sternorrhyncha, Coccoidea, Diaspididae) from China. ZooKeys 210: 1-8, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.210.3071, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.210.3071
